document.full_text: thousands of syrian mourners chanted slogans calling for the overthrow of president bashar al-assad sunday at the funeral of a soldier killed during unrest sweeping the country, witnesses said.
document.title: thousands chant anti-assad slogans at syria funeral
lines_and_colors: thousands of syrian mourners chanted slogans calling for the overthrow of president bashar al-assad sunday at the funeral of a soldier killed during unrest sweeping the country, witnesses said.
